name: Wardens of Siegevale - Souls of Valor
name_original: Wardens of Siegevale - Souls of Valor
description:
The village of Siegevale was taken by a group of Undead and Fiends. It's the Wardens' job to wipe them out and bring peace back to the village.

A short souls-like done for the sake of learning the basics.

Just over one month of solo development to reach the current state.
Will add items throughout the level to give the player a better understanding of the story.
Minor bugs and balance issues will be addressed. Looking for feedback on these matters.
